channel.title: HKG:1211 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in HKG:1211 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: BYD Runs India Remotely as China Tensions Shut Out Top Brass
item.description: China’s BYD Co. is forging ahead with its attempts to expand in India despite roadblocks from the government that are preventing the electric vehicle maker from conducting key business dealings there.

item.title: BYD Runs India Remotely as China Tensions Shut Out Top Brass
